location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Francis Warden, Chief Secretary to the Government at Bombay Castle to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter from Francis Warden, Chief Secretary to the Government of Bombay to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire, acknowledging the receipt of the letter sent on 4 June 1813, congratulating Bruce on the recovery of the debt due by Ahmed Iben Seyf to William Smith. The letter mentions the discussion on the renewal of the 1806 treaty against piracy and maritime protection granted to British vessels in the Persian Gulf.
